programme.title: Big Match (Squid Game's Lee Jung-jae)
programme.desc: Choi Ik-ho is a baseball player turned a WFC fighter after getting banned from the baseball league over an assault charge. He is enormously talented in fighting and soon becomes a superstar in the WFC. However, one day the police come to find him and tell him that Young-ho, his brother and manager who had gone missing, has been arrested as a prime suspect for a murder of a man who had visited Young-ho to suggest a game for Ik-ho.

programme.title: HITMAN: AGENT JUN
programme.desc: Jun, a former human weapon turned webtoon artist, must protect his peaceful family life amid a massive battle.

programme.title: Someone You Loved
programme.desc: Jun-ho and A-yeong are a couple living together. One day, She feels he is wasting his life with the excuse of an exam.

programme.title: Go Back
programme.desc: Ji-won, a motivated new police officer, is strangely bothered after meeting O-sun, a social worker. On a hot summer day, a kidnapper sends a message saying, ‘If you want to save the kidnapped child, donate money to the welfare center.’ The incident becomes a national concern as the media report it. Somehow, Ji-won doubts the link between the case and O-sun.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il, who is a five-month pregnant ahead of her marriage, goes to her hometown to find her biological father, whom she has never seen since the age of seven. After returning to Seoul, To-il’s mom, stepdad and biological father join forces to find the groom-to-be who has been missing on the day of the meeting with bride-groom families.

programme.title: One-Line
programme.desc: A young hustler joins a group of professional con artists to begin a career in loan brokerage. The field is dangerous, especially when you can't trust the other players.

programme.title: Christmas Carol
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a teen's body is found. His vengeful twin enters juvie to find the truth, hunting suspects.

programme.title: Deep Trap
programme.desc: As a couple's therapy for trauma, Jun-sik and So-yeon travel to a remote island and visit a shabby restaurant.

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: Hiding his murderous past, Joo-hyeop faces a deadly choice when his son's friend learns his dark secret.

programme.title: 4:44 : Time Of Fear
programme.desc: Missing persons. Eerie sounds. Shadows at night. Bukchon Apartment hides more than secrets.

programme.title: She's On Duty
programme.desc: For catching a gangster, a cop, Jae-in, poses as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: Happy Together
programme.desc: A lonely mother, Jung-im unknowingly spends the night with her daughter, Eugene's boyfriend at a club.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: A bed soaked in blood, a missing body and charges of murder. No one can be trusted until the trial is over!
